title: Havel Power of the Powerless MCQ 3

content.question: In addition to the factors exemplified by the passage, the end of the Cold War was also directly hastened by all of the following EXCEPT

choices.label: United States military and diplomatic pressure on the Soviet Union
a deepening economic crisis as a result of a downturn in oil prices
the signing of nuclear arms control treaties between the United States and the Soviet Union
the costly and ultimately unsuccessful Soviet invasion of Afghanistan

content.answer: the signing of nuclear arms control treaties between the United States and the Soviet Union

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
